original_text: I have tried to provide the things that he will need to build the temple for my God. They include gold, silver, bronze, iron and wood to make things. I have also given many valuable stones, including onyx, antimony and other jewels, as well as a lot of marble. Chronicles Introduction
korean_text: 내가 이미 내 하나님의 성전을 위하여 힘을 다하여 준비하였나니 곧 기구를 만들 금과 은과 놋과 철과 나무와 또 마노와 가공할 검은 보석과 채석과 다른 모든 보석과 옥돌이 매우 많으며

sentences.original_text: I have tried to provide the things
They include gold, silver, bronze, iron and wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 금, 은, 청동, 철 그리고 나무를 포함합니다

sentences.original_text: I have also given many valuable stones
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 많은 귀중한 돌들을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: including onyx, antimony and other jewels
sentences.korean_translation: 오닉스, 안티모니 그리고 다른 보석들을 포함하여

sentences.original_text: as well as a lot of marble
